• Portfolio

I am a front-end web developer by-way-of web design by-way-of web cartography by-way-of geography. I came to programming after I realized that that was where all the fun stuff was happening.

After getting sick of throwing around dropbox links, and maintaining multiple CV-style collections of my work, I decided to create this simple, small website. Given more time I would have made it even smaller.
